sub_title: Innovator and strategist of growth marketing for disruptive businesses in the digital space
summary:
✔︎ Let's connect! ►► I'm always looking to add great & interesting people to my network, especially in the digital marketing, entertainment, sport, technology areas. And of course current and former colleagues (Airbnb / eBay / Fanatics...). Award-winning marketing executive with lots of good stories from the trenches. Please let me know how I can help you, now, or at any time in the future.
. . . . . . .

Dennis Goedegebuure is a growth marketing executive with nearly 20 years of experience working for big brands you will know; eBay, PayPal, Fanatics and Airbnb. 

Dennis enjoys working at direct to consumer or consumer brands as the work touches so many aspects how people make their daily decisions. He finds it fascinating to understand how marketing influences the daily habits and purchase behavior of every consumer segment. 

After 15 years working in the Bay Area, Dennis and his family moved back to The Netherlands during the Covid-19 pandemic. Being close to family and friends was the driving factor in this decision. As with so many aspects of business, the Corona lock down accelerated the decision to move back to The Netherlands. 
 
Dennis holds a master degree from the University of Amsterdam, specialized in Marketing and Finance.
He lives with his wife and 4 children in Wassenaar, The Netherlands.

treasury_media.title: Wall and Chain: a story of breaking down walls
treasury_media.description: In May 2012, an Airbnb guest, Cathrine, told us a powerful story of a trip she took to Berlin with her father, Jörg, a Berlin Wall guard at the height of the Cold War. She wanted to show him the vibrant city Berlin had become, but it was the man they met at their Airbnb apartment that changed everything for Jörg.

projects.title: Airbnb "Wall and Chain"
projects.description: In a globalized and connected world, ‘belonging’ has taken on new meaning. Airbnb believe that people can “Belong Anywhere” and they embrace this new sense of freedom. For them, we have created a campaign that celebrates the 25th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall by telling a true and emotive story – The Wall and Chain.

authors.headline: Innovator and strategist of growth marketing for disruptive businesses in the digital space

profile_positions.title: VP Brand & Creative Marketing + Ferrari Partnership

profile_positions.description:
VP of Global New Customer Acquisition will drive new customer acquisition revenue for the Consumer Business as it enters its next stage of growth.

In this leadership role, the VP of Global New Customer Acquisition will be responsible to develop and execute a creative and cohesive digital marketing strategy to scale customer acquisition across all owned, paid and earned media. This will be accomplished thru paid and organic integrated digital marketing campaigns including direct, search, content, social, video, display, app store, etc.
The VP of Global New Customer Acquisition will utilize data, analytics, customer insights, and usability best practices to identify and inform prioritization of key growth initiatives.

The VP of Global New Customer Acquisition will be responsible for improving the new customer journeys, identify new audiences, key conversion funnels to unlock new customer growth from free or trial services to paid services, subscription growth, and revenue growth (AB testing, optimizing paid media campaigns, organic initiatives, and conversion rate optimization).

The VP of Global New Customer Acquisition will be asked to unlock new growth opportunity's (including new platforms, channels, and advertising and integration opportunity's) to acquire new and engaged customers. This individual will own and report on key metrics and KPI's for the acquisition team (LTV:CAC ratio etc. type of analysis, customer segmentation, KPI analysis, A/B testing results, business cases etc.
The VP of Global New Customer Acquisition will own the budgeting, and reporting process for customer acquisition, including forecasting and ROI assessments
profile_positions.title: VP New Consumer Growth & Acquisition

profile_positions.description:
A diverse group of five well-connected and specialized European founders and operators are selected to participate in this program. Each of them will be able to invest EUR 100,000 in exceptional companies that have the potential to scale worldwide and change millions of lives for the better.

The venture scouts all have experience either as a founder or operator in a SaaS, marketplace, or platform company, which is in line with our investment focus. 

This is a part-time position for me.
profile_positions.title: Venture Scout

profile_positions.description:
Personally recruited by PayPal’s CMO Allison Johnson to set up the growth marketing function across PayPal entities with focus on the consumer strategy

Leading the global strategy for Direct to Consumer marketing for PayPal entities with focus on growth of key business metrics through:
•	Adopting a marketing technology strategy which transform how PayPal is prioritizing a customer centric strategy using 1st party data, augmented with 2nd & 3rd party data as its competitive advantage to drive growth across key business metrics
•	Paid acquisition channels; SEM & programmatic display, social, SEO, life cycle marketing, web experimentation & testing throughout the funnel
•	Built use cases in acquisition, adoption, engagement & churn for accelerating growth through the Marketing Technology Customer Data Platform. 
•	Organize growth experiments through cross functional growth squads
•	Manage a high performing growth marketing team of 50, with an annual multi million dollar budget
•	Key member of M&A due diligence team on growth marketing opportunities, data & analytics and international market sizing; resulting in acquisition of Honey at $4 billion – Nov 2019
profile_positions.title: Snr Director - Head of Global Consumer Growth Marketing

profile_positions.description: Advisor pre-and post launch for the company on strategy, tactics and technology for SEO
profile_positions.title: Advisor

profile_positions.description:
	Member of the direct-to-consumer leadership team, responsible in changing the Fanatics business from being the cash register at the end of the funnel for the league partners, selling other people’s product, into a fully vertically integrated company, building the Fanatics branded product line. Moved team processes from manual optimization, to machine driven automation & learning.
	Led international expansion- & entry into soccer vertical strategy, resulting in acquisition of Kitbag Ltd. The official partner of Manchester United, Real Madrid & Manchester City
	Designed platform migration process. Responsible for strategic leadership of cross functional migration team- & roadmap. Led migration efforts to move ~90% of North-America ecommerce revenue onto the new platform in 6 months with minimal business disruption. Full SEO recovery between 23-35 days, increased conversion rate by 20%
	 Set up A/B testing framework, using Facebook REACT. Adopted SEO testing across major partner sites. 
	Awards: US search awards 2018 - Best in-house Search team

Focussing on Growth & the new SEO; Content Marketing & Social amplification are diverging in which we combine three key elements of content marketing strategy, psychographic targeting & affinity retargeting:
- Disproportionate amount of media coverage
- Social engagement & amplification
- Ultimately; long term SEO impact

profile_positions.title: VP Growth & SEO

profile_positions.description:
	Hired in the Growth leadership team, co-responsible for global growth programs & new market entry analysis 
	Building in-house SEO program & team. Prioritize product roadmap for SEO opportunities to maximize impact
	Introduced A/B testing framework for SEO channel. Platform stretching across all growth marketing channels
	Strategic lead for Airbnb Wall & Chain campaign. An award-winning content marketing strategy based on true story. 

While working on Global SEO strategies, I developed successful Content Marketing Strategy campaigns.
These campaigns set the new benchmark for Airbnb marketing to aspire to. These campaigns are:
- End of year Economic Impact Study Infographic
- Wall and Chain, an animation based on a true story of two former Berlin Wall guards
- Berlin Economic Impact Study Infographic
The Berlin film; Wall and Chain is what I now call "The best work in my career so far"

Combining content marketing strategies with psychographic targeting and affinity retargeting, drives social engagement, which results in social amplification of the content, more links for SEO and drives a disproportional amount of media coverage of the EPIC content

Speaker at:

- Expert at SEOktoberfest (Sept 2014)
